name: Path of Thalanos (itch)
description:
Path of Thalanos is a roguelike dungeon crawler with a rich random item and skill system. Encounter many random generated events, shrines, traps and enemies. Build your hero and find out how deep you can go into the dungeon. Each run is unique.

More information can be found on Steam. This is a first playable experience. Any feedback is welcome & needed. Please consider following me on twitter or wishlisting the game on Steam. Thanks for your support!

Gameplay

Turn-Based combat. Discover enemies, traps, shops, random encounters and events.
Each floor is randomly generated based on your progress. How far can you climb?

Items

Many different item modifiers with random rolls allow different play styles. Customize your character.
Consumable & equippable items.

Enemies

Enemies have a base ability and different tiers, which means stronger enemies spawn on higher floors. In addition enemies scale with floor level
and they get random abilities as the game progresses. Abilities can trigger on discover, on death or every round. Enemies are also able to cast spells.

Skills

A randomly generated skill tree helps you to choose a direction for your playstyle. Everytime you spend 9 skillpoints a new tree is generated.
